name: BNNSLayerParametersResize
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a resize layer.

items.name: init(method: BNNSInterpolationMethod, i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, align_corners: Bool)
items.desc: Returns a new resize-layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new resize-layer parameters structure.

items.name: var align_corners: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to align the corners of the upscaling grid to the center of scaling dimensions instead of to the edges.
